versos: (upon) Psalm 127:1 - "Unless the Lord builds the house, those who build it labor in vain. Unless the Lord watches over the city, the watchman stays awake in vain.";;;
(breasts) Song of Solomon 7:3 - Your two breasts are like two fawns
(whose) 1 Corinthians 8:9 - But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak.;;;
(receive) John 1:12 - "But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God.";;;
(milk) 1 Peter 2:2: "Like newborn babies, crave pure spiritual milk, so that by it you may grow up in your salvation.";;;
(thus) "So the word of God spread. The number of disciples in Jerusalem increased rapidly, and a large number of priests became obedient to the faith." - Acts 6:7;;;
(use) 1 Corinthians 7:31 - "those who use the things of the world, as if not engrossed in them. For this world in its present form is passing away.";;;

(either) 1 Corinthians 10:13 - "No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can endure it.";;;
(without) Ephesians 2:12 - remember that at that time you were separate from Christ
(note) Philippians 4:6 - "Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.";;;
(luke) luke 1:4 - so that you may know the certainty of the things you have been taught.;;;
(jonah) jonah 1:1 - The word of the Lord came to jonah son of Amittai:;;;
(men) 1 Timothy 2:5 - "For there is one God, and there is one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,";;;
(death) Romans 6:23 - For the wages of sin is death
(fault) Psalm 19:12 - "But who can discern their own errors Forgive my hidden faults.";;;
(seeking) Matthew 7:7 - "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.";;;
(order) 1 Corinthians 14:40 - "But all things should be done decently and in order.";;;
(law) Psalm 119:105 - Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.;;;
